docBody.p: Subject of b.c. raised from the personal, individual aspect to the racial and international,

In U.S.A. the personal--in Europe racial conflict. Conflict between that which is true biologically or economically & that which appeals to us from the religious or Social point of view. Let all of these aspects be discussed. So that we shall know & be able to give a reason for the faith that is in us.
Two classes of Society--} large & small families.

One class limited members for past 1/2 century thereby raising the lever & allowing the other class to enter--had this not been done--working class would have been down to paupers & deplorable conditions infant mortality. Today large family } poverty, overcrowding.
